resources.string:
Hi, my name is Daulet. 

I love video Games. 

The CS:GO and Dota 2 is my favourite ones. 
Fun fact is that I have played Dota 1 when i was 11 years old. 

I remember it was just a map on Warcraft 3. 
And sometimes I even go play it. 
And even less sometimes, I actually win at this game. 

Once, when I was playing Dota 1, I have met a person, we became friends and now our Internet friendship lasts 5 years. 

I'll be happy to meet him in real life some time. 
You should always stay positive.
